import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useHttp } from '../../hooks/http.hook'; const UniversalForm = props => { const [isValid,setValid] = useState(false); const { loading, error, request} = useHttp(); const validation = event =>{ const form = event.target; if (form.checkValidity() === false) { event.preventDefault(); event.stopPropagation(); } else{ event.preventDefault(); console.log("hello world"); } setValid(true); } return(
